channel.title: Need Quest Tab Cases

item.title: Need Quest Tab Cases
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

[quote=“YaNo, post:10, topic:117833”]the sendquest id is prob the same as the case… (there can be multiple cases like case 1: case 1: and so on, i think…)
because if you hover over the emote tabs it says like “160” if you then search for case 160 you will come at the emote :S[/quote]
That case 28164 in game is sendQuest 7332…

Read full topic

item.title: Need Quest Tab Cases
item.dc:creator: @1337_king 1337 king
item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

[quote="-Legend-, post:8, topic:117833"]I need the cases which active what I want to do. Not be able to see it. Your thinking of dragging mouse to the quest and it says like 7335, but that a sendQuest not a case.

Maybe try using the sendquest id for the case?

sendQuests are for viewing it, not being able to click on it/do it.[/quote]Well, i can only say 2 things:
If nobody can tell you the cases,

1.Try making it so when you click on ANY cases, you get a sendmessage, “You clicked case ####” i dont know if this is possible, just an idea.

2.Try using the cases in order. I mean, you said the first quest’s case. Try it and see if the next one is only 1 number higher.

28164 - Quest 1 28165 -Quest 2?

Read full topic

item.title: Need Quest Tab Cases

item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

I need the cases which active what I want to do. Not be able to see it. Your thinking of dragging mouse to the quest and it says like 7335, but that a sendQuest not a case.

1337 king:

Maybe try using the sendquest id for the case?

sendQuests are for viewing it, not being able to click on it/do it.

item.title: Need Quest Tab Cases
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

Each spot in quest tab has its own case. You cannot just “create” any case for it, as you so put it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Quest Tab Cases
item.dc:creator: @viruz_3 viruz 3
item.description:
@viruz_3 wrote:

They are very easy to create you know…

Take what you have there and copy it below this one. Use Moparscape Client 3.2 to identify the cases. Then simply change whats in the case. Like so:

case 28164:
sendMessage("This is the first quest");
break;

Let me know if you need further help.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Quest Tab Cases
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

Not sendquests, not sendframes, but quest tab cases. To find cases look for

case 28164: DragonLongSpecial(); break; Copy cases under it.

Read full topic
